languages.title: Languages
languages.summary: Am more experienced in Javascript developer because I have had more interractions with the language. Next is java. I have used java in android application development. I have some experience with python. I used python Django and Flask in some of my projects.

frontEnd.title: Front-end-Frameworks
frontEnd.summary: There are a lot of arguments around which frameworks to us. Well it all depends on the team you are working with and the size of the project. With angular, I find it easy to join any team because the conventions are the same. React is also good especially on small projects. Anyway thats my view.

backEnd.title: Back-end-Frameworks
backEnd.summary: Django is cool because its easy to set up. It has standard which make it easy to work on any Django project. Express make me maintain javascript both in the back-end and front-end

databases.title: Databases
databases.summary: I have worked with both SQL and NoSQl database.

designTools.title: UI Design tools
designTools.summary: Illustrator brings out my creative design skills. Its interesting to design mock-ups using this tool

hosting.title: Hosting Services
hosting.summary: I have experience managing linux servers and also using PAAS like appengine and EBS

projectManagementTools.title: Project Management Tools
projectManagementTools.summary: This tool helps me manage abd plan my work ahead of time
